name: Challenge Wood Truck Level
description:
Challenge Wood Truck Level is cargo truck transport simulator aimes at the successful transportation of the 3d cargo. You need to pick up the indian cargo using trailer and loads it into the indian truck driving simulator.
Features:
* Best real cargo truck simulator 3D of Truck games.
* Real experience of driving heavy wood transporter in this transport truck game.
* Explore the various environments in the truck simulator 3D mania.
* Complete all exciting levels of big transporter driving
